name: 王建評
objective:
本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。

This class explains basic principles and classifications of fuel cell from mechanical aspect.
Current development and history of the fuel cell will be introduce in the next step. Finally, how to improve cell efficiency and lifetime are the most important topics. Simple experiments will be implemented in the class to help student understand.
schedule:
1. Fundamental physics and architecture
2. Fundamental physics and architecture
3. Introduction of fuel cell
4. Introduction of fuel cell
5. Introduction of fuel cell
6. Fuel cell efficiency
7. Fuel cell efficiency
8. Fuel cell efficiency
9. 期中考
10. PEM fuel cell
11. PEM fuel cell
12. PEM fuel cell
13. SOFC fuel cell
14. SOFC fuel cell
15. SOFC fuel cell
16. Flow channel analysis
17. Flow channel analysis
18. Flow channel analysis
19. 期末考

name: 李懿軒
objective:
先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of Instructor
Introduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.
schedule:
1.　　應力與應變
2.　　靜不定
3.　　Torsion 圓斷面 薄壁管 非圓斷面
4.　　樑的剪力與彎矩
5.　　樑的彎應力
6.　　樑的剪應力
7.　　樑的撓度
8.　　靜不定樑
9.　　複合負載之應力
10.　　應力、應變的轉換
11.　　複合樑之應力與撓度
scorePolicy: 課堂小考：20% 作業：20% 期中考：30% 期末考：30%

高立圖書
